message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and quality, it's truly a valuable asset for anyone looking to enhance their experience. Given its worth to us, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $140. This is a fantastic opportunity to own something that would typically cost more, and we believe it aligns well with its value to you at $120. We're confident it will exceed your expectations. Thank you for considering our offer.
